Topstartup

Gossipr now live on facebook

Gossipr, the application I have been working on for a couple of weeks is now live. It is essentially a Web 2.0 way to spread gossip and rumors about your friends. People usually spread rumors and gossip on the phone or even in email. Now, there's a better way

Gossipr beats email

    <li><strong>Anonymity</strong> - email can always get back to you! Gossipr lets you hide your identity</li>
<li><strong>Reach</strong> - a great piece of gossip can be seen by hundreds of thousands of facebook users</li>
<li><strong>Privacy</strong> - choose only those people whom you know and trust with your secrets - there's <em>no forward button</em> that leaves your email address attached</li>

I hope you enjoy using Gossipr as much as we've enjoyed making it! Let us know how we can make it a better place to spread your gossip and rumors.
